name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cheesecakes Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: cream cheese, sugar, flour, egg, chocolate chips, vanilla extract, chocolate peanut butter cup
recipeIngredient: 1 cup chocolate chips, melted and cooled
recipeInstructionSteps: In a bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and flour until smooth.
Add eggs and mix until combined.
Fold in melted chocolate and vanilla extract.
Line a muffin tin with muffin liners. Place a peanut butter cup upside down in each cup.
Fill cups ¾-full with cheesecake mixture.
Bake 20 minutes, cool completely, and refrigerate for 3 hours.
